greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n} A019565(phi(d)), where phi is Euler totient function A000010.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
program: A019565(n) = {my(j,v); factorback(Mat(vector(if(n, #n=vecextract(binary(n), "-1..1")), j, [prime(j), n[j]])~))}; \\ From A019565
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 25 2020
